meanings.definition: A person who invents, especially as a profession.
meanings.sent1: Many famous inventors have created useful things.
meanings.sent2: The inventors showcased their latest inventions at the technology fair.
meanings.sent3: The inventors at the workshop were always coming up with new ideas.
meanings.sent4: Inventors are like modern-day wizards, bringing magic to life through their creations.
meanings.sent5: The inventors' workshop buzzed with creativity and innovation.

meanings.definition: The act or process of inventing.
meanings.sent1: The inventors of the new gadget worked tirelessly to perfect it.
meanings.sent2: Inventors require a lot of imagination and problem-solving skills.
meanings.sent3: The inventors of the crazy contraption had everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: Inventors sculpt ideas from the clay of possibility.
meanings.sent5: The inventors' brainstorming session was a whirlwind of ideas and excitement.
